name: Peanut Butter Cup Ice Cream
comments: DO NOT use more than one cup of peanut butter, or this ice cream will be overwhelmingly thick.
ingredients: roughly 1 c. chopped Reese's peanut butter cups
instructions: In medium bowl, use hand mixer on low speed to combine peanut butter and sugar until smooth. Add milk and mix on low until sugar is dissolved, 1-2 minutes. Stir in heavy cream and vanilla. Cover and refrigerate 1-2 hours, or overnight. Freeze according to manufacturer's directions. During last 5 minutes of freezing, add Reese's peanut butter cups.
